---
id: initiate-nhi-grace-period
title: "POST /inactivity/grace-period/{id} — Initiate a grace period for an entity."
description: "Sets a deadline after which the entity will be auto-suspended if still inactive."
sidebar_label: "POST /inactivity/grace-period/{id} — Initiate a grace period for an entity."
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
---

<MethodEndpoint

Sets a deadline after which the entity will be auto-suspended if still inactive.
